messages.content: I enjoyed this nearly as much as I enjoy too many pints.

Keep going man. I’ve been enjoying reading your posts. All the best!
I understand that but I enjoy the silence and lonely feeling I have.
Aww man this sucks, but at least he’s going to Europe, so I’m happy for him! Goodbye [NAME]!

Having good people around you is the most important part i am glad you found some good friends:)
